content.question: All of the following are true of railroad expansion in the late nineteenth century EXCEPT that it

choices.label: opened new territories to commercial agriculture
accelerated the growth of some older cities and created new ones
was financed by private corporations without government assistance
led to new managerial forms and techniques
was often capitalized beyond what was needed

content.answer: was financed by private corporations without government assistance

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
